Council Members each have an office at 250 Broadway , as well as offices in each of their districts. We want to hear from you You can reach us via social media, email, paper mail, or at your district office. For issues specific to a neighborhood, it's best to contact the Council Member representing that community. Have questions, comments or feedback? Email us here.
